entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
